docs.summary:
The CAPTCHA API is used to display a modal that presents a challenge-response test to site visitors 
to determine whether they are human or a bot.
description: reCAPTCHA allows you to present a challenge-response test
to site visitors to determine whether they are human or a bot. Use reCAPTCHA
to verify that site visitors are human before allowing them to perform
To ensure complete protection, you must include backend [authorization](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/wix-captcha-backend/authorize)
as a mandatory step of the CAPTCHA validation lifecycle.
To use the reCaptcha API, import `wixCaptcha` from the `wix-crm` module:
